Body:
Description: Dear Netwrix Team,

We're trying to set up external storage on our EPP installation and keep getting an error message that it cannot connect to the share we've made available.

However, a check of the firewall logs shows that the EPP Server doesn't make any connections at all when testing this.

The share settings are correct and have been checked using other devices on the network. The EPP Server is able to connect successfully to our AD and to our Mailserver but not to the fileshare.

I feel that we've missed some deeper configuration on the EPP Server but am at a loss as to what that could be. Any help would be much appreciated.

Kind regards,

Matt

What We've Learned Updated: 12/05/2025

Client is setting up an external storage on their EPP installation when they're getting an error saying it cannot connect to the share they've made available through the share.

Next Steps Updated: 12/05/2025
Will need more details.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, IT Support
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

What We've Learned Updated: 12/05/2025

Client is setting up an external storage on their EPP installation when they're getting an error saying it cannot connect to the share they've made available through the share.

16/05/2025

Client did not show up to the meeting.

Next Steps Updated: 12/05/2025
Will need more details.

16/05/2025
Sent note asking to reschedule.

What We've Learned Updated: 12/05/2025

Client is setting up an external storage on their EPP installation when they're getting an error saying it cannot connect to the share they've made available through the share.

16/05/2025

Client did not show up to the meeting.

19/05/2025
Connected remote with the client to assist further with the case.
Went on the SSH and did a ping to the shared drive and it was connecting.
What the problem was after doing some change in the settings was the fact that the intial username Matt used was wrong. After correcting that, we tested again and it was working.
In the shared drive folder where he mounted the backups, the 3 folders were generated successfully.
Closing ticket as resolved.
